AvocadoCharacter:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 Strength.

MarkOfNausea.NAME: Mark of Nausea
MarkOfNausea.FLAVOR: This brand is used to signify parasites who have mastered nausea.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 Energy at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 #ySlimeds into your draw pile.

SuckDummy.NAME: Suck Dummy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you heal HP during combat, heal #b2 additional HP

TwistedTendril.NAME: Twisted Tendril
TwistedTendril.FLAVOR: It stretches and twists interminably, searching for anything to grab on to.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b3 #yConstricted to ALL enemies.

NonNewtonianFlesh.NAME: Non-Newtonian Flesh
NonNewtonianFlesh.FLAVOR: "Most curious! It appears to gain enormous viscosity upon being struck!" - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: If you lost HP during the previous turn, gain #bBlock equal to half your #yPlated #yArmor at the start of your turn.

GreenSkull.NAME: Green Skull
GreenSkull.FLAVOR: A small skull collected from fallen ascenders.
DESCRIPTIONS: While your HP is at or below #b50%, you have #b3 additional #yPlated #yArmor.

PitOfFury.NAME: Pit of Fury
PitOfFury.FLAVOR: This seed is just so angry.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain #b2 temporary #yStrength.

PreservedParasite.NAME: Preserved Parasite
PreservedParasite.FLAVOR: The parasite seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly normal enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies in non-elite and non-boss encounters have #b20% less HP

StartCodon.NAME: Start Codon
StartCodon.FLAVOR: This piece of genetic information tells the avocado to just 'go'.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 additional [E] for each #yInnate card in your deck
